library(ggplot2)

# cut = Very Good
# color = I
# clarity SI1 / SI2
df <- read.csv('diamonds.csv')
max.price <- 5000 - 820

select <- df$clarity == 'SI2' & df$color == 'I' & df$price < max.price
g <- ggplot(df[select, ], aes(x=carat, y=price)) + geom_point(alpha=0.25) + facet_grid(. ~ cut) + theme_bw()
print(g)
